articles.title: Watch: Authorities in Xiamen, China test fish for Covid-19 - CNN Video
articles.description: Videos showing workers in the coastal city of Xiamen testing fish and crabs have sparked ridicule as China maintains its zero-Covid policy.

articles.author: Anna Cooban, CNN Business
articles.title: The world's second biggest movie theater chain is in trouble
articles.description: The owner of Regal Cinemas is having a tough time — its stock crashed as much as 80% Friday after reports that its parent company is preparing to file for bankruptcy.

articles.author: Selina Wang, Sandi Sidhu, Simone McCarthy
articles.title: China must show it's not an 'agent of instability' on Taiwan, US Ambassador to China says
articles.description: China needs to convince the rest of the world it is not an "agent of instability" and will act peacefully in the Taiwan Strait, US Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns said in his first TV interview since taking up his post in Beijing six months ago.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Putin and Xi to attend G20 summit, Indonesian president says, setting up showdown with Biden
articles.description: The leaders of China and Russia both plan to attend November's G20 summit, its host said Thursday, setting up a high-profile showdown with US President Joe Biden.
articles.content:

articles.author: Nectar Gan, CNN
articles.title: Chinese-Canadian tycoon Xiao Jianhua sentenced to 13 years in prison
articles.description: Chinese-Canadian tycoon Xiao Jianhua was sentenced Friday to 13 years in prison, more than five years after the billionaire was abducted from a hotel room in Hong Kong and taken to mainland China.
articles.content: Hong Kong (CNN)Chinese-Canadian tycoon Xiao Jianhua was sentenced Friday to 13 years in prison, more than five years after the billionaire was abducted from a hotel room in Hong Kong and taken to mai… [+2950 chars]

articles.author: Analysis by Brad Lendon, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: 'New normal' across the Taiwan Strait as China threat looms ever closer
articles.description: China is attempting to establish a "new normal" across the Taiwan Strait, eroding self-ruled Taiwan's territorial control and increasing the threat of a strike with each military sortie, officials and analysts say.
articles.content: A version of this story appeared in CNN's Meanwhile in China newsletter, a three-times-a-week update exploring what you need to know about the country's rise and how it impacts the world. Sign up her… [+7106 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Gangel, Elizabeth Stuart and Jeremy Herb, CNN
articles.title: CNN Exclusive: 'Ludicrous.' 'Ridiculous.' 'A complete fiction.': Former Trump officials say his claim of 'standing order' to declassify is nonsense
articles.description: In the days since the FBI seized classified and top secret documents from Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort, the former President and his allies have claimed that Trump had a "standing order" to declassify documents he took from the Oval Office to the White Ho…

articles.author: Wayne Chang and Lauren Lau, CNN Business
articles.title: US and Taiwan agree to start talks on a trade and investment pact
articles.description: The United States and Taiwan have officially agreed to launch negotiations on a new trade and investment pact, according to statements released by Washington and Taipei.

articles.author: Laura He, CNN Business
articles.title: China's No.2 admits economic recovery is at 'most difficult point'
articles.description: Chinese Premier Li Keqiang has urged China's wealthiest provinces to "bravely take the lead" to bolster growth and employment, a day after official data painted a gloomy picture for the world's second largest economy.

articles.author: Kathleen Magramo, CNN
articles.title: Hong Kong tells teachers to study Xi Jinping's speech
articles.description: The Hong Kong government is distributing thousands of copies of a speech by Chinese leader Xi Jinping to schools in the city for teachers to "study and learn."
